dc_title_s: Map of the lower portion of the Grand River Basin showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the lower portion of the Grand River Basin and the quality of underground water.|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|"Prepared by HENRY L. PREE, JR. Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"|Scale bar lower left corner.
